name: Dragpocalypse
description:
A drag queen finds herself in the apocalypse. 

Can your werq your way to victory? 

No, you can't.

But you can delay the inevitable...

A spare wigA wig fit for the purpose of whipping; A whig.ShadeRead everything around you to filth.High HeelsHigh heels perfect for throwing
Tears of a Drag QueenMoisturise yourself, giving you a random upgrade, or not!

Credits:

  • Aziz - Programming
  • Sean - Pixel Art

Music:
Dark Ambience Loop by Iwan Gabovitch (http://opengameart.org/users/qubodup)
